title.rendered: MARRIOTT INTERNATIONAL CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT, DEVELOPMENT TO SPEAK AT MORGAN STANLEY TRAVEL AND LEISURE CONFERENCE JUNE 4; REMARKS TO BE WEBCAST

content.rendered:
BETHESDA, Md., May 24, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Marriott International, Inc.’s (Nasdaq: MAR), Chief Financial Officer and Executive Vice President, Development Leeny Oberg, will speak at the 2024 Morgan Stanley Travel and Leisure Conference, to be held on Tuesday, June 4.  Ms. Oberg’s remarks will be at approximately 9:45 a.m., Eastern Time, and will be webcast live.

To access the webcast, please go to http://www.marriott.com/investor, and then click on the link to the “Morgan Stanley Travel and Leisure Conference” under “Events and Presentations.”

The webcast will be available until August 30, 2024, at the same site.

Marriott International, Inc. (Nasdaq: MAR) is based in Bethesda, Maryland, USA, and encompasses a portfolio of nearly 8,900 properties across more than 30 leading brands in 141 countries and territories. Marriott operates and franchises hotels and licenses vacation ownership resorts all around the world. The company offers Marriott Bonvoy®, its highly awarded travel program.  For more information, please visit our website at www.marriott.com, and for the latest company news, visit www.marriottnewscenter.com.  In addition, connect with us on Facebook and @MarriottIntl on X and Instagram.

IRPR#1

SOURCE Marriott International, Inc.



Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/marriott-international-chief-financial-officer-and-executive-vice-president-development-to-speak-at-morgan-stanley-travel-and-leisure-conference-june-4-remarks-to-be-webcast-302154703.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
